p: Initially, we tested two strains of each lineage and compare the quantification by flow cytometry and qRT-PCR. The results were very similar for both strains ( S1 Fig). As qRT-PCR is a fast and reliable method, it was used for quantification of the viruses. One strain was chosen as prototype for each lineage, 287/11 for L1 lineage and 484/12 for L6 lineage.
